医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
可穿戴式活动追踪器有望检测疾病的早期信号Fitbit、Apple Watch 或 Oura 戒指等可穿戴技术在注重健康的人群中需求量很大。但除了测量心率和血压之外，健身追踪器是否可以用于测试和有效筛查疾病？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Wearable-activity-trackers-show-promise-in-detecting-early-signals-of-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Wearable-activity-trackers-show-promise-in-detecting-early-signals-of-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b60e4e8-605b-4f0b-af83-f33aadbbbc4c Fri, 06 Sep 2024 09:40:00 -0400 Wearable activity trackers show promise in detecting early signals of disease
解决与过度电子游戏相关的身体健康风险游戏是一项很受欢迎的活动，尤其是对于年轻人来说，随着夏季接近尾声，越来越多的孩子可能会选择花时间玩电子游戏，而不是享受户外时光。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Addressing-the-physical-health-risks-lated-to-excessive-video-gaming.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Addressing-the-physical-health-risks-lated-to-excessive-video-gaming.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=565320f4-e656-4e5e-9937-99fc1f8c35f2 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 09:30:00 -0400 Addressing the physical health risks related to excessive video gaming
主要资金增加旨在推进乳腺癌和前列腺癌骨转移的研究Breast Cancer Now 和前列腺癌研究中心联手资助高达 60 万英镑的新研究，以解决这两种癌症向骨骼的扩散，即骨转移。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Major-funding-boost-aims-to-advance-research-on-bone-metastasis-in-breast-and-prostate-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Major-funding-boost-aims-to-advance-research-on-bone-metastasis-in-breast-and-prostate-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb6c1795-e690-44c5-a739-15d64b6d9995 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 09:15:00 -0400 Major funding boost aims to advance research on bone metastasis in breast and prostate cancers
微型磁性纳米机器人有望治疗脑动脉瘤研究人员创造了纳米级机器人，可用于治疗动脉瘤引起的大脑出血。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Tiny-Magnetic-nanorobots-show-promise-for-treating-brain-aneurysms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Tiny-Magnetic-nanorobots-show-promise-for-treating-brain-aneurysms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02d26463-2b22-403f-a2b8-50451db741b4 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 08:48:00 -0400 Tiny magnetic nanorobots show promise for treating brain aneurysms
国际空间站实验揭示了癌症诊断生物传感的新进展圣母大学正在国际空间站 (ISS) 上领导一系列突破性实验，以彻底改变早期癌症检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/ISS-experiments-reveal-new-advances-in-biosensing-for-cancer-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/ISS-experiments-reveal-new-advances-in-biosensing-for-cancer-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d26e898b-4cbf-4497-9bfd-40e346b81e63 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 08:37:00 -0400 ISS experiments reveal new advances in biosensing for cancer diagnostics
Unfold AI 在前列腺癌风险预测方面优于传统方法BJUI Compass 最近发表的一项研究证实了 Unfold AI™ 的突破性潜力，这是一种经 FDA 批准的人工智能 (AI) 算法，由个性化前列腺癌护理领域的领导者 Avenda Health 开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Unfold-AI-outperforms-conventional-methods-in-prostate-cancer-risk-prediction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Unfold-AI-outperforms-conventional-methods-in-prostate-cancer-risk-prediction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19084f8c-d7ab-4b16-8447-be287f897296 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 08:29:00 -0400 Unfold AI outperforms conventional methods in prostate cancer risk prediction
感谢 Reddit，一种新的诊断结果正在全国范围内传播在今年夏天发布在 Reddit 上的一段视频中，露西·罗森塔尔 (Lucie Rosenthal) 的表情开始变得专注而不确定，在事情发生之前全神贯注地看着镜头。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Thanks-to-Reddit-a-new-diagnosis-is-bubbling-up-across-the-nation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Thanks-to-Reddit-a-new-diagnosis-is-bubbling-up-across-the-nation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39b68620-7c6f-4281-b6b5-e9a6aac0d376 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 06:55:55 -0400 Thanks to Reddit, a new diagnosis is bubbling up across the nation
随着创纪录的高温席卷美国，一些人必须在食品和能源账单之间做出选择六月份，炎热的天气覆盖了东南部大部分地区，史黛西·弗里曼 (Stacey Freeman) 使用窗户装置为她位于北卡罗来纳州费耶特维尔的隔热不良的移动房屋降温。整个冬天，这位 44 岁的妈妈都靠小型取暖器生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/As-record-heat-sweeps-the-us-some-people-must-choose- Between-food-and-energy-bills.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/As-record-heat-sweeps-the-us-some-people-must-choose- Between-food-and-energy-bills.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0fe9ebd5-6b2c-4365-a1a2-e3c2c41a9b93 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 06:49:00 -0400 As record heat sweeps the us, some people must choose between food and energy bills
xFakeSci 工具能否识别人工智能生成的虚假内容？研究人员评估了 xFakeSci 在区分真实科学内容和 ChatGPT 生成内容方面的表现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Can-the-xFakeSci-tool-identify-fake-AI- generated-content.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Can-the-xFakeSci-tool-identify-fake-AI- generated-content.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54ec1ce6-3a72-43cb-b92d-5019b183c22d Fri, 06 Sep 2024 06:28:00 -0400 Can the xFakeSci tool identify fake AI-generated content?
地中海饮食与超加工食品：对老年人虚弱的影响研究人员评估了超加工食品和地中海饮食评分是否与老年人的虚弱和心脏代谢疾病相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Mediterranean-diet-vs-Ultra-processed-foods-Impact-on-frailty-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Mediterranean-diet-vs-Ultra-processed-foods-Impact-on-frailty-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32bf008a-45b4-416d-a832-6f8b88801142 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 06:20:00 -0400 Mediterranean diet vs. Ultra-processed foods: Impact on frailty in older adults
